/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street, bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in hues of yellow and beige, rise high into the clear blue sky, their many windows reflecting the sunlight.

The street itself is devoid of any human presence, save for a solitary car parked on the left side, adding a touch of tranquility to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, trees stand tall, their green foliage contrasting beautifully with the concrete structures. A crane looms in the background, a symbol of the city's continuous growth and development.

The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. Despite the absence of people, the image exudes a sense of life and vibrancy, a testament to the city's ceaseless energy.
